sections.heading: sale; sheriff as master commissioner
sections.text: A sheriff may act as a master commissioner under subdivision (1)(b) of section 25-1326. Sales made under such subdivision shall conform in all respects to the laws regulating sales of land upon execution.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 452, p. 468;R.S.1913, ยง 8020;C.S.192
